home-condition.title: General Terms and Conditions
home-condition.paragraph-1: These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Tossé Company Limited's website, located at https://www.”Tossé”.net. By accessing this website we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not use Tossé if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
home-condition.paragraph-2: The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements: “Client”, “You” and “Your” refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. “The Company”, “Ourselves”, “We”, “Us” and “Our” refers to our Company. “Party”, “Parties”, or “Us”, refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to the same.
home-condition.paragraphe-3: We use cookies. By accessing Tossé you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with the privacy policy of “Tossé” Company Limited. Most interactive websites use cookies to enable us to retrieve user details for each visit. Cookies are used by our website to enable the functionality of certain areas to make it easier for people to visit our website. Some of our affiliate/advertising partners may also use cookies.
home-condition.paragraphe-4: Unless otherwise stated, Tossé Company Limited and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights in all material on Tossé. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this material from Tossé for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
home-condition.subparagraphe-4: - Sell, rent or sublicense material from Tossé
home-condition.subparagraphe-5: - Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Tossé
home-condition.title-3: This Agreement shall enter into force on the date hereof.
home-condition.paragraphe-5: Certain parts of this website offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Tossé Company Limited does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Tossé Company Limited, its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Tossé Company Limited shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.
home-condition.paragraphe-6: Tossé Company Limited reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.
home-condition.paragraphe-7: The following organizations may link to our Website without prior written approval:
home-condition.subparagraphe-10: - Online directory distributors may link to our Web site in the same manner as they hyperlink to the Web sites of other listed businesses; and
home-condition.subparagraphe-11: - Systemwide Accredited Businesses except soliciting non-profit organizations, charity shopping malls, and charity fundraising groups which may not hyperlink to our Web site.
home-condition.paragraphe-8: These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other Web site information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way misleading; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party's site.
home-condition.paragraphe-9: Sans automation is available and with permission to write, you can't create screens on any of our Web pages that modify what makes it possible for the display to appear or the appearance of our Web site.
home-condition.paragraphe-11: We do not have any responsibility for the content that appears on your website. You accept our protector and our defense against all the reclamations that are sent to your website. Also, do not click on a website that connects to it as it is different, obscene or criminal, or if it is clear, it appears or prevents the violation or tout other violations on the surface of the tiers.
home-condition.paragraphe-15: We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our Website. You agree to immediately remove all links to our Website upon request. We also reserve the right to amend these terms and conditions and its linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our Website, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions.
home-condition.title-7: Removal of links from our website.
home-condition.paragraphe-16: If you find any link on our website that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact us and inform us at any time. We will consider requests to remove links, but we are not obliged to do so or to respond to you directly.
home-condition.paragraphe-17: We do not guarantee that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the content of the website is maintained.
home-condition.paragraphe-18: To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our website and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:
home-condition.paragraphe-19: - limit or exclude our or your liability for death or personal injury;
home-condition.paragraphe-20: - limit or exclude our or your liability for fraud or fraudulent misrepresentation;
home-condition.paragraphe-21: - limit any of our or your liabilities in any way that is not permitted under applicable law; or
home-condition.paragraphe-22: - exclude any of our or your liabilities that may not be excluded under applicable law.
home-condition.paragraphe-23: The limitations and prohibitions of liability set out in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer:
home-condition.paragraphe-24: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph
home-condition.paragraphe-26: (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
home-condition.paragraphe-27: As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature.

home-confidentiality.title: Tossé Data Privacy Policy
home-confidentiality.paragraph-1: We take privacy seriously. This highlights who we are, what information we collect about you, and what we do with it. Capitalized terms that are not defined in this Privacy Policy have the meanings given to them in our Terms of Use. Please also read our.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-2: relating to the service you are interested in. They provide more information about how we operate our business and any eligibility restrictions that may apply. By using our service, you consent to the data practices prescribed in this statement.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-3: We collect phone numbers only. We store transactions using the phone number only to identify users. We may also retain any messages you send through the Service. By using the paid aspects of the Service, you may be required to share billing and payment information with our third-party payment processor, and you expressly agree to the use of your billing and payment information by that third-party payment processor. We also collect and use information about your interactions with the Service in a manner and format that does not identify you as an individual (“Non-Personally Identifiable Information”). We may collect, use and disclose the following types of data.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-4: We use third-party analytics tools to help us measure traffic and usage trends for the Service. These tools collect information that your browser sends as part of a web page request, including the web pages you visit, your browser add-ons, the width and height of your browser, and other information that helps us improve the Service. We may collect and use this analytics information along with your personally identifiable information to create a broader profile of our individual users so that we can better serve you.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-5: When you visit the Service, we may send one or more cookies a small text file containing a string of alphanumeric characters to your computer that uniquely identifies your browser. This allows Switchn to help you log in more quickly and improve your navigation of the site. A cookie also may transmit information to us about how you use the Service (for example, the pages you view, the links you click, and other actions you take on the Service), and may allow us or our business partners to track your use of the Service over time. A persistent cookie remains on your hard drive after you close your browser. Persistent cookies may be used by your browser on subsequent visits to the site. Persistent cookies can be deleted by following your web browser's instructions. A session cookie is temporary and disappears after you close your browser. You can reset your web browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, some features of the Serv'ce may not function properly if the ability to accept cookies is disabled.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-6: When you use the Service, we may use clear gifs (also known as web beacons) that are used to anonymously track our users' online usage patterns. Additionally, we may also use clear gifs in HTML emails sent to our users to track which emails are opened and which links recipients click on. The information is used to compile more accurate reports and improve the Service.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-7: We may use the personally identifiable information we collect or receive to communicate directly with you. We will occasionally send you SMS updates about technology, announce new features, remind you of events, or inform you of other important news. You always have the option to unsubscribe from these messages. We also use your personal information to send you service-related emails (e.g., account verification, changes/updates to service features, technical and security notices). You may unsubscribe from service-related SMS messages.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8: We use or may use cookies, log files and clear gifs to:
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-1: (a) remember information so that you do not have to re-enter it during your visit or the next time you visit the Site;
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-2: (b) provide personalized and customized content and information;
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-3: (c) to provide and monitor the effectiveness of our Service;
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-4: (d) monitor aggregate metrics such as total number of visitors, traffic and demographic trends;
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-6: (f) help you to efficiently access your information;
home-confidentiality.paragraph-8-7: and (h) to deliver advertising to your device.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-10: We will not sell any personally identifiable information to third parties outside of Tossé and its controlled subsidiaries and affiliates without your consent, except as set forth below:
home-confidentiality.title-11: Who we may share your personally identifiable information with:
home-confidentiality.paragraph-11: We may share your personal information with third party business partners for the purpose of providing the Service to you (e.g., email providers, server providers, etc.). These business partners will have limited access to personally identifiable information that is reasonably necessary to provide the Service, and we will require such third parties to comply with this Privacy Policy. With whom you may choose to share your personally identifiable information: Any personally identifiable information or content that you voluntarily disclose for posting on the Service, such as User Content, becomes publicly available. If you delete information that you have posted on the Service, copies may remain viewable in cached and archived pages of the Service, or if other users have copied or saved that information. We use a third party service provider to manage payment processing. By using the paid aspects of the Service, you agree to share your billing and other payment information with any third party payment processor for the purpose of processing your payments. Non-Personally Identifiable Information: We may share non-personally identifiable information, including information obtained through tools such as cookies, log files, and clear gifts (such as anonymous usage data, referring/exit pages and URLs, platform types, number of clicks, etc.): (i) in any manner permitted for personally identifiable information; and (ii) with our third-party business partners. We may also aggregate or otherwise remove data of any personally identifiable characteristics and may share such aggregated and anonymized data with third parties. Access If you wish to correct, amend, or delete any information on the Site, you may email us at 'Tossémoro@gmail.com'. International Transfers Personally identifiable information collected through the Service may be stored and processed in Cameroon or any other country in which Tossé or its subsidiaries, affiliates, or service providers maintain facilities. Tossé may transfer information that we collect about you, including personally identifiable information, to affiliated entities or other third parties across borders and from your country or jurisdiction to other countries or jurisdictions around the world. If you are located in the United States or other regions with laws governing data collection and use that may differ from Cameroonian law, please note that we may transfer information, including personally identifiable information, to a country and jurisdiction that does not have the same data protection laws as in your jurisdiction, and you consent to the transfer of information to Cameroon or any other country in which Tossé or its subsidiaries, affiliates or service providers maintain facilities and to the use and disclosure of information about you, including personally identifiable information, as described in this Privacy Policy. Children, Tossé does not knowingly collect or solicit personally identifiable information from anyone under the age of 18 or knowingly allow such persons to register as users. The Service and its contents are not intended for children under the age of 18. If you are under 18, please do not send us any information about yourself, including your name, address, telephone number, or email address. If we learn we have collected personal information from a child under 18 without verification of parental consent, we will delete that information as quickly as possible. If you believe we might have any information from or about a child under 18, please contact us at 'Tossémoro@gmail.com'.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-12: We are not responsible for the practices employed by websites or services linked to the Service, including the information or content contained therein. Please remember that when you use a link that directs you from our Service to another website, our Privacy Policy does not apply to third-party websites or services, including, without limitation, third-party payment processors. Your browsing and interaction on any third-party website or service, including those that have a link on our website, are subject to that third party's own rules and policies. Further, you agree that we are not responsible for, and have no control over, any third parties that you allow to access your User Content. If you use a third-party website or service (such as Facebook) and allow such third parties to access your User Content, you do so at your own risk. This Privacy Policy does not apply to information we collect by other means (including offline) and from sources other than through the Service.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-13: We may, in our sole discretion, modify or update this Privacy Policy from time to time, and you should therefore review this page periodically. When we change the policy in a material manner, we will update the “Last Modified” date at the bottom of this page.
home-confidentiality.paragraph-14: If you believe that Tossé has not adhered to this Privacy Policy, please contact us by email at 'Tossémoro@gmail.com' and we will use commercially reasonable efforts to remedy the problem. This Privacy Policy has not yet been modified.
